meanings.definition: Bold or reckless feats or actions
meanings.sent1: His daredevilries on the skateboard amazed everyone at the park.
meanings.sent2: The circus performer's daredevilries left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent3: The cat's daredevilries chasing after a squirrel made the whole family laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her daredevilries in business were like walking a tightrope without a safety net.
meanings.sent5: The daredevilries of the mountain climber were etched in the minds of all who witnessed.

meanings.definition: The act of engaging in dangerous or risky activities
meanings.sent1: Engaging in daredevilries like skydiving requires courage and preparation.
meanings.sent2: His daredevilries in extreme sports often left his friends worried.
meanings.sent3: The daredevilries of trying to cook a complicated dish without a recipe ended in disaster.
meanings.sent4: Her daredevilries on the dance floor made her the life of the party.
meanings.sent5: The daredevilries of exploring the abandoned house sent shivers down their spines.

meanings.definition: The quality of being daring or adventurous
meanings.sent1: His daredevilries were fueled by a thirst for excitement and new experiences.
meanings.sent2: The explorer's daredevilries led him to discover hidden treasures in the jungle.
meanings.sent3: The daredevilries of trying a new food every day made her a local legend.
meanings.sent4: Her daredevilries in fashion always turned heads wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The daredevilries of the detective in solving cases were unmatched in the city.
